name: RoboBot 2000
details: The RoboBot 2000 action figure is a powerful robotic companion. With its advanced features and interactive capabilities, it provides hours of entertainment and imaginative play.

name: Mega Mech
details: Unleash the power of the Mega Mech action figure! With its towering height and incredible strength, it's ready to take on any battle.

name: SpeedyBot
details: Get ready for high-speed racing with the SpeedyBot remote control car. It's designed for maximum speed and maneuverability on any terrain.

name: Robo Creator
details: Create your own army of drones with the Robo Creator set. Build, customize, and command your drones to complete exciting missions.

name: RoboBot
details: The RoboBot action figure is a versatile companion for all your adventures. It can transform into different modes and has incredible flexibility.

name: Ninja Bot
details: Become a ninja master with the Ninja Bot action figure. It has lightning-fast reflexes and deadly martial arts skills to take down any enemy.

name: Power Racer
details: Experience the thrill of racing with the Power Racer remote control car. Its powerful motor and sleek design make it a winner on the tracks.

name: AquaBot
details: Dive into underwater adventures with the AquaBot remote control submarine. Its waterproof design and maneuverability make it perfect for exploration.

name: Stunt Master
details: Prepare for jaw-dropping stunts with the Stunt Master remote control car. It can perform flips, spins, and other amazing tricks.

name: ConstructoBot
details: Unleash your creativity with the ConstructoBot building set. It comes with various pieces to build unique structures and robots.

name: Builder's Delight
details: Let your imagination run wild with the Builder's Delight building set. It contains a wide range of bricks and components for endless construction possibilities.

name: Builder's Delight
